snippet.title: Truck driver killed in Riverina crash
snippet.content: A man has died after his truck veered off the roadway and crashed into a tree in the Riverina region of NSW. Emergency services were called to the Sturt Highway in Narrandera at about 1.50pm on Wednesday following reports of a crash. Initial investigations show the truck hit a tree, killing the driver who was aged in his 40s or 50s. He is yet to be formally identified and police investigations continue. A crime scene has been established and part of the highway closed. (C) AAP 2017
